DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare pharmacokinetics three different formulation Pf-04937319
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Compare The Pharmacokinetics Of Different Formulations Of PF-04937319 In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Subjects childbearing potential must agree use highly effective method contraception throughout study least 28days last dose treatment . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 23 33 kg/m2 total body weight > =50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( exclude untreated seasonal allergy ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen .
